jcr:root.description: HUAWEI P10 sets an industry benchmark for style and craftsmanship with the first hyper diamond-cut finishing on a smartphone, which adds strength and colour. Finishes also available in high gloss and sandblast.
jcr:root.title: COLOUR · STYLE · INNOVATION
